item.title: Prologue
item.description: A planet teeming with advanced life rotates in the vast and boundless cosmos. The planet’s sole advanced lifeform refers to itself as humans! Awakening from primitive times, evolving over countless millions of years, and passing through three consecutive mythological eras - “Worship of Gods,” “Demise of Gods,” and “Creation of Gods” - humans entered a new era. They abandoned the primitive and mysterious myths, grasping the weapon of “science.” They severed the instinctual power clinging to them, stepping into a new age of enlightenment.

item.title: Chapter 1, Su Yi, Episode 1, Episode 1
Part 1 Episode 1 Rampage Languang Chapter 2 Sister
item.description: Languang Seven Islands, located just a few dozen nautical miles from the largest continent of the Eastern Midland Plate, are inhabited by people of the Yanhuang ethnic group. They are a group of picturesque islands in the vast Heavenly Ocean, often referred to as the “earrings of the Heavenly Ocean.” Originally, these islands were known for producing a precious gemstone called “blue light,” and were referred to as “Languang” by ancient people.

item.title: Chapter 3 You Rong
item.description: Little did I know of a conspiracy conversation going on in sync with me, I only know one thing now - I’m lost! Turning left and right, I obviously saw the government building opposite the Spring and Autumn Pavilion, but why did I walk further and further away? I was really baffled, after half an hour of being in a daze, the pedestrians were much denser at dusk, and the crowds were mixed, so my cloth bag was so light, and my wallet flew away!
